```{r setup}
library(eyeris)
```

```{r load-data}
el.raw <- system.file("extdata", "madore2020.asc", package = "eyeris")
```

```{r eyeris-pipeline}
el.preproc <- el.raw |> 
  eyeris::load() |> 
  eyeris::deblink(extend = 75) |> 
  eyeris::despeed(n = 8) #|> 
  # eyeris::smooth(n = 250)
```
